entities.description: Indicator of whether a person was approached by someone selling illegal drugs in the past 30 days.
Indicator of how often a person gets a real kick out of doing dangerous things.
Indicator of how often a person likes to test themselves by doing risky things.
Indicator of how often a person wears a seatbelt when riding in the front passenger seat of a car.
Indicator of how often a person wears a seatbelt when driving a car.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent was approached by someone selling illegal drugs in the past 30 days.
Measures how often the respondent gets a kick out of doing dangerous things.
Measures how often the respondent likes to test themselves by doing risky things.
Measures how often the respondent wears a seatbelt when riding in the front passenger seat of a car.
Measures how often the respondent wears a seatbelt when driving a car.
